data.actual_result: A crash alert pops up and the Server Settings screen pops up. Hitting back from there restarts the app.
data.expected_result: The app returns to the Overview screen
data.short_description: Crash when canceling uploading a server icon
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to (or create) a server where you have Manage Server permission - Go to Server Settings, then Overview - Tap the server icon, then tap back when it asks which app to choose an icon from
